author: Karla Adam, William Booth
title: Queen Elizabeth II tests positive for covid, is experiencing 'mild cold like symptoms,' palace says - The Washington Post
description: The British monarch, 95, is expecting to “continue light duties" in the coming week, the palace said.
content: Her son and heir, Prince Charles, tested positive for the virus and went into isolation 10 days earlier, after being at Windsor with the queen. Charless wife, Camilla, has since had a positive test, … [+4914 chars]
